problem_text_cn: 如图,左、右并排的两棵树AB和CD,小树的高AB=6m,大树的高CD=9m,小明估计自己眼睛距地面EF=1.5m,当他站在F点时恰好看到大树顶端C点．已知此时他与小树的距离BF=2m,则两棵树之间的距离BD是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there are two trees AB and CD side by side on the left and right. The height of the small tree is AB = N_0, and the height of the big tree is CD = N_1. Xiao Ming estimates that his eyes are above the ground EF = N_2, and he looks right when he stands at point F. Go to point C at the top of the tree. Knowing that the distance BF between him and the small tree at this time = N_3, then the distance BD between the two trees is ()
notes: 连续几百道同样套路的相似三角形求边了，过
